page.title: 15GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: In{Hide-and-seek}a seeker is chosen to guard the "den",close his eyes and count to 100 while the others hide.If he finds all the hiders and gets back to the den before them,he becomes the hider,while the first person caught is the new seeker.Should a hider get to the den first,he can release all the captured hiders by shouting "One,two, three,buzz off".They all buzz off to find new hiding places while the same seeker re-starts the game. In{Dodge-ball}one person tries to eliminate the others from the game by hitting them below the knee with a football.The thrower cannot run with the ball but the others can run to dodge it.The winner is the last person left dodging the ball.He becomes thrower in the next game.
